name: Oyster Island Resort

reviews.text: Our 6 nights at Oyster Island were fantastic. We had our adult children with us & booked this resort after reading previous good reviews. I did have a few reservations about it tho because of the distance from Luganville & isolation. However there was absolutely no need to worry about that. Grant the manager sat down with us every night to see what we wanted to do the next day & either took us or organised transport for us. Who wants to stay in Luganville anyway! The 2 blue holes were very close by & a must to see. We got a ride with a local (paid him quite generously) to the amazing Champagne Beach & Grant took us to a village one day. Grant also organised the diving trips for the divers in the group which were such an amazing experience.
reviews.title: Perfect family holiday

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The food was fantastic & well priced. I would have liked some lighter items on the menu for lunch. The rooms were great - right on the water with good balconies - not 5 star but very comfortable. Our fare had recently been upgraded & had excellent brand new bathroom.
reviews.title: Cute bungalow, friendly staff, good food
Oyster Island is a magical place to stay!
reviews.text: Thanks Grant for an excellent week.

Our accommodation was excellent - I don't think its fair to complain about the noise of the high tide waking me up at night because we were so close to the sea! A very cute bungalow, nothing posh but very private, a good bathroom and bed, and a balcony to relax on.
reviews.title: Heaven on Earth

description: Come and sample the delights of Vanuatu at beautiful Oyster Island Resort, only a two minute boat ride from the mainland across a calm channel. Experience absolute beachfront accommodation and enjoy the natural beauty from your private waterfront balcony, all at a price to suit your budget. This magnificent tropical paradise is located on the eastern side of Espiritu Santo and is a mere 15km drive from Luganville.
